name: Event Wizard Online Registration Software
overview:
Event Wizard is an industry leading online registration software that allows you to easily create and manage unlimited event registration websites.

Event Wizard puts you in control of your event registration process from start to finish. It enables you to create simple registration forms or large multi-page event websites in any language, using any currency. Our full suite of robust reporting tools allows you to accurately manage your registrations and plan your event accordingly. We’ve even allowed you to customize what you pay, adding only the features you need to your registration form.

Event Wizard is the most trusted online event registration software available. We’ve been providing registration to successful event planners since 2001 and each day hundreds of registrations are processed using our software.
